links.text: You sense that there's more to it than the lieutenant lets on, but the politics of the issue are too *complex* for your fragile mind to grasp right now. Maybe try again when you have more facts?

links.title: You: ""Okay, so the case *probably* isn't..."
links.text: "Okay, so the case *probably* isn't mysterious -- but could it be *sexy*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As you know, there was considerabl..."
links.text: "As you know, there was considerable interest in this case at my station, but probably not for the reasons you have in mind..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Cut this boring stuff off immediate..."
links.text: Cut this boring stuff off immediately. You know what this case is about!

links.title: You: ""Maybe there's a young woman involv..."
links.text: "Maybe there's a young woman involved?!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it just so happens there's a..."
links.text: "Yes, it just so happens there's a beautiful, blonde nineteen year old woman at the heart of this case. A rich one, in fact. Part of a murder-sex-cult."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The weary tone is the surest indica..."
links.text: The weary tone is the surest indicator that the lieutenant is being *sarcastic*.

links.title: You: ""You're being sarcastic, aren't you?""
links.text: "You're being sarcastic, aren't you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Extremely.""
links.text: "Extremely."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It can still be an otherwordly sex-..."
links.text: It can still be an otherwordly sex-mystery *in your head*. With a dark twist, even.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's basically *challenging* you to..."
links.text: He's basically *challenging* you to sex it up with some lurid twist. Don't get right into it, sit on it a bit -- then hit him with it!

links.title: You: ""Wow, really? That's *mega* sexy!""
links.text: "Wow, really? That's *mega* sexy!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, not *really*. Was there anythi..."
links.text: "No, not *really*. Was there anything else?"

links.title: You: ""It doesn't *have* to be a cult. It..."
links.text: "It doesn't *have* to be a cult. It can just be sex-murder."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's commendable. Was there anyt..."
links.text: "That's commendable. Was there anything else?"

links.title: You: ""It doesn't *have* to be murder. It..."
links.text: "It doesn't *have* to be murder. It can just be sex."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually it does have to be murder..."
links.text: "Actually it does have to be murder. This is a murder investigation. But we digress."

links.title: You: ""Are you *sure* there's not some se..."
links.text: "Are you *sure* there's not some sex-angle we should be considering?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good point. Martinaise is *famed*..."
links.text: "Good point. Martinaise is *famed* for its occult sex-murder rites. We'll get on it *immediately*."

links.title: You: ""Oh, I guess that settles it, then.""
links.text: "Oh, I guess that settles it, then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excellent. Was there anything else?""
links.text: "Excellent. Was there anything else?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was some interest in this ca..."
links.text: "There was some interest in this case at my station, but not for the reasons you have in mind. You seem to wish there was..."

links.title: You: ""That's all I needed to know.""
links.text: "That's all I needed to know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his collar...."
links.text: The lieutenant adjusts his collar. It doesn't look like he *wants* the case to be more mysterious.

links.title: You: ""If we're from different precincts,..."
links.text: "If we're from different precincts, why are we on the same case?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid you and I are pawns in..."
links.text: "I'm afraid you and I are pawns in a..." He considers the phrasing. "A *pissing* competition."

links.title: Empathy: "His disdain is clear. This man woul..."
links.text: His disdain is clear. This man would not use such an expression otherwise.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't know?" His eyes narrow...."
links.text: "You don't know?" His eyes narrow. "I assumed you were in on it."

links.title: You: ""I don't remember being in on anyth..."
links.text: "I don't remember being in on anything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's good.""
links.text: "That's good."

links.title: You: ""You know what I'm in on -- retrogr..."
links.text: "You know what I'm in on -- retrograde amnesia."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Better still than an imbecilic *Co..."
links.text: "Better still than an imbecilic *Cop Off*."

links.title: You: ""Cop Off?""
links.text: "Cop Off?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just stupidity." The lieutena..."
links.text: "It's just stupidity." The lieutenant shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about it.""
links.text: "Tell me about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just stupidity. We shouldn't..."
links.text: "It's just stupidity. We shouldn't waste any more time on it. If you want my take, ask me after we've inspected the victim."

links.title: Suggestion: "On the surface he's dismissive, but..."
links.text: On the surface he's dismissive, but there's a conspiratorial glint in his black eyes. If only you knew what *he* would say...

links.title: You: ""You should tell me now. This seems..."
links.text: "You should tell me now. This seems relevant."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Later." His voice is unflinching...."
links.text: "Later." His voice is unflinching. "Was there anything else you wanted to know about the case?"

links.title: You: "Let it go."
links.text: Let it go.

links.title: You: ""Now that we've inspected the scene..."
links.text: "Now that we've inspected the scene -- I want to know more about this 'pissing competition' you mentioned."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's there to say? It's just stu..."
links.text: "What's there to say? It's just stupidity."

links.title: You: ""What kind of stupidity?""
links.text: "What kind of stupidity?"

links.title: You: "Let it go."
links.text: Let it go.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Was there anything else you wanted..."
links.text: "Was there anything else you wanted to know about the case?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, I have all I need for no..."
links.text: "Actually, I have all I need for now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant nods."
links.text: "Good." The lieutenant nods.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about the case.""
links.text: "Tell me about the case."

links.title: You: "Why did the 41st send me?"
links.text: Why did the 41st send me?

links.title: Logic: "Look at you -- it's because you're..."
links.text: Look at you -- it's because you're a failure. They sent you to *slight* Precinct 57.

links.title: You: "What, no. That can't be right."
links.text: What, no. That can't be right.

links.title: Logic: "Just think about it for a second. Y..."
links.text: Just think about it for a second. You're a raging alcoholic who showed up three days late wearing piss-stained disco garb. You weren't sent here to *win*.

links.title: You: ""Kim, what if my precinct sent me o..."
links.text: "Kim, what if my precinct sent me on this case *because* I'm a fuck up? Like... as a joke."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've considered it." His voice is..."
links.text: "I've considered it." His voice is sombre.

links.title: You: ""So it's true.""
links.text: "So it's true."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would be immensely ugly of them..."
links.text: "It would be immensely ugly of them, not to mention unprofessional.... But I also think it's somewhat unlikely."

links.title: You: ""Why's that?""
links.text: "Why's that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I checked the records. This jurisd..."
links.text: "I checked the records. This jurisdiction dispute -- who polices Martinaise -- reaches back to the Thirties. It's as old as my station. And all this time we can't decide who gets Martinaise? I think, yes, both stations would prefer a win."

links.title: You: ""Ha, so you *are* their finest.""
links.text: "Ha, so you *are* their finest."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am the finest of nothing.""
links.text: "I am the finest of nothing."

links.title: You: ""Do you really see me as a safe bet?""
links.text: "Do you really see me as a safe bet?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Safe? No. But you're old. You've m..."
links.text: "Safe? No. But you're old. You've made it this far. *Something* has brought you through. We've only just started working together, so I don't know what it is yet. But it's there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So no, I don't think they sent you..."
links.text: "So no, I don't think they sent you as a joke. And even if they did, they are in for a surprise."

links.title: Volition: "He's right. There are no airtight t..."
links.text: He's right. There are no airtight theories, just paranoia. You've given it some thought, now let it go.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Safe? No. But you're old. You've m..."
links.text: "Safe? No. But you're old. You've made it this far. Something has brought you through. I haven't worked with you yet, so I don't know what it is. But it's there."

links.title: You: ""But it's not true, right?""
links.text: "But it's not true, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think I can say one way or..."
links.text: "I don't think I can say one way or another. I do think it's somewhat unlikely, though."

links.title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
links.text: Keep it to yourself.

links.title: Logic: "Of course, it's only a *theory*."
links.text: Of course, it's only a *theory*.

links.title: Volition: "Whatever their reasoning, there's n..."
links.text: Whatever their reasoning, there's nothing written that says you have to prove them *right*.

links.title: You: "Yeah, that makes more sense than th..."
links.text: Yeah, that makes more sense than the other stuff I thought of.

links.title: Logic: "You pick over what's left of your f..."
links.text: You pick over what's left of your frontal cortex, but no compelling explanations emerge...

links.title: Logic: "Because you're the best qualified?..."
links.text: Because you're the best qualified? No, that doesn't seem right...

links.title: You: "No, that makes sense! I'm *exceedin..."
links.text: No, that makes sense! I'm *exceedingly* qualified!

links.title: Logic: "If you're so well qualified, why ca..."
links.text: If you're so well qualified, why can't you remember why you were sent? Anyway -- don't keep the lieutenant waiting.

links.title: You: "Dumb brain, I'm good for nothing."
links.text: Dumb brain, I'm good for nothing.

links.title: Logic: "You *look* dumb if you keep the lie..."
links.text: You *look* dumb if you keep the lieutenant waiting for too long.

links.title: You: "Convince Kim there's a sexy dark my..."
links.text: Convince Kim there's a sexy dark mystery twist in the case.

links.title: Inland Empire: "What if *you* did it?"
links.text: What if *you* did it?

links.title: You: "Did... what? The hanged man?"
links.text: Did... what? The hanged man?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes, you killed him. And then, as p..."
links.text: Yes, you killed him. And then, as part of the plan, you drowned out the memory...

links.title: Half Light: "It wasn't that you were horrified -..."
links.text: It wasn't that you were horrified -- you were just surprised by your own daring!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Forgetting was merely a matter of c..."
links.text: Forgetting was merely a matter of convenience -- very clever!

links.title: Empathy: "Maybe this is why your chest feels..."
links.text: Maybe this is why your chest feels so hollow -- you did an awful thing, and you can't even bring yourself to acknowledge it...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Are you sure you would have had the..."
links.text: Are you sure you would have had the strength to take down a hardened mercenary? You're not in the best shape.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps you did it for the Union --..."
links.text: Perhaps you did it for the Union -- your political beliefs gave you the strength and courage to take on such a formidable opponent.

links.title: You: ""Kim... I think *I* may be the murd..."
links.text: "Kim... I think *I* may be the murderer. I killed the man and then tricked myself into forgetting about it."

links.title: You: "Keep it to yourself. This is your b..."
links.text: Keep it to yourself. This is your burden to bear now.

links.title: You: "What nonsense. [Discard the idea.]"
links.text: What nonsense. [Discard the idea.]

links.title: You: "Did what? I can't even remember wha..."
links.text: Did what? I can't even remember what the case is. What was it...

links.title: Inland Empire: ""It" is murder, of course. Murder...."
links.text: "It" is murder, of course. Murder. It can't be anything else. And *you* did it. And then, horrified by your own actions, you drowned out the memory...

links.title: Half Light: "It wasn't that you were horrified -..."
links.text: It wasn't that you were horrified -- you were just surprised by your own daring!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Forgetting was merely a matter of c..."
links.text: Forgetting was merely a matter of convenience -- very clever!

links.title: Empathy: "Maybe this is why your chest feels..."
links.text: Maybe this is why your chest feels so hollow -- you did an awful thing, and you can't even bring yourself to acknowledge it...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps you did it for the Union --..."
links.text: Perhaps you did it for the Union -- your political beliefs inspired this extreme act of violence.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Only banal things strike you. At th..."
links.text: Only banal things strike you. At the core, you're a very banal person, with a very small soul.

links.title: Inland Empire: "One you should be *ashamed* of. It'..."
links.text: One you should be *ashamed* of. It's no wonder the soft one doesn't want it back. It was right to abandon you...

links.title: You: ""I have big news, Kim." (Tell Kim a..."
links.text: "I have big news, Kim." (Tell Kim about how you no longer obsess over your sexuality.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: You: ""I have managed to stop obsessing a..."
links.text: "I have managed to stop obsessing about my sexuality."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great. Imagine all the time you'll..."
links.text: "Great. Imagine all the time you'll have for work now -- matter of fact, we should get back to it right now."

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm.""
links.text: "Mhm."

links.title: You: ""Just one thing though...""
links.text: "Just one thing though..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""Are *you* part of the homo-sexual..."
links.text: "Are *you* part of the homo-sexual underground?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You didn't stop at all, did you? Y..."
links.text: "You didn't stop at all, did you? You're just obsessing about *other people's* sexuality now."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Uhm... uh..."
links.text: Uhm... uh...

links.title: You: ""Yeah, but...""
links.text: "Yeah, but..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... but am I? I'll spare you anoth..."
links.text: "... but am I? I'll spare you another *20 hour mind-project* -- yes, I am. Now let's get back to work."

links.title: Drama: "That's the truth."
links.text: That's the truth.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... but *am* I? I'll spare you ano..."
links.text: "... but *am* I? I'll spare you another twenty hours thinking about it -- yes, I am. Now let's get back to work."

links.title: You: ""You're right, yes. Let's go." [Lea..."
links.text: "You're right, yes. Let's go." [Leave]

links.title: You: ""Nothing, let's go." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Nothing, let's go." [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Get back to it. [Leave]"
links.text: Get back to it. [Leave]

links.title: You: "Nod."
links.text: Nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He turns his attention elsewhere."
links.text: He turns his attention elsewhere.

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Actually, as I'm saying t..."
links.text: "Nothing. Actually, as I'm saying this, I realize I would not be telling the truth."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay -- was there anything else?""
links.text: "Okay -- was there anything else?"

links.title: Composure: "He's not the least bit curious abou..."
links.text: He's not the least bit curious about what you planned to say.

links.title: You: ""I think you should know that I can..."
links.text: "I think you should know that I can't remember *anything*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "No response. He just arches his bro..."
links.text: No response. He just arches his brow.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's having trouble processing it...."
links.text: He's having trouble processing it. *Believing* it even.

links.title: You: ""I really don't remember anything...."
links.text: "I really don't remember anything. There was drinking involved."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Have you tried concentrating on so..."
links.text: "Have you tried concentrating on something other than your personal affairs?"

links.title: Empathy: "There is a sudden, harsh edge to hi..."
links.text: There is a sudden, harsh edge to his voice. Like he's tired of hearing about your "personal affairs."

links.title: You: ""Okay. Forget it.""
links.text: "Okay. Forget it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A moment passes. The lieutenant gla..."
links.text: A moment passes. The lieutenant glances at the sports watch on his wrist.

links.title: You: ""Uhm. I want to talk about *you*.""
links.text: "Uhm. I want to talk about *you*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What about me?""
links.text: "What about me?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Me*?""
You: ""Yes, you.""
links.text: "Yes, you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't see how *my* life is perti..."
links.text: "I don't see how *my* life is pertinent to the investigation."

links.title: You: ""We'll work better together if we h..."
links.text: "We'll work better together if we have more rapport."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm, that's a fair point. Alright..."
links.text: "Hmmm, that's a fair point. Alright, for the good of the investigation, what do you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""Come on, lieutenant, open up a lit..."
links.text: "Come on, lieutenant, open up a little."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "If you insist. What do y..."
links.text: He sighs. "If you insist. What do you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""You're right. What's there to know..."
links.text: "You're right. What's there to know about a lame binoclard?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Binoclard? Is that how they do thi..."
links.text: "Binoclard? Is that how they do things over at the 41st? No wonder your clearance rate is so low."

links.title: You: ""You seem to be following me.""
links.text: "You seem to be following me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me?""
links.text: "Excuse me?"

links.title: You: ""What if I want to work this case a..."
links.text: "What if I want to work this case alone?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, if I may be frank -- yo..."
links.text: "Detective, if I may be frank -- you seem to be in a deranged state. You have trouble remembering things, you've *misplaced* your badge. I cannot let you act in the name of the RCM without supervision until you've regained control of your faculties."

links.title: Volition: "Oh, so you're an unaccountable wrec..."
links.text: Oh, so you're an unaccountable wreck who has to be supervised? You don't *have* to take this display of authority, you can disobey!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, if I may be frank -- yo..."
links.text: "Detective, if I may be frank -- you seem to be in a deranged state. You have trouble remembering things. I cannot let you act in the name of the RCM without supervision until you've regained control of your faculties."

links.title: You: ""Beat it. You're cramping my style.""
links.text: "Beat it. You're cramping my style."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Frankly, detective, you're in a de..."
links.text: "Frankly, detective, you're in a deranged state. I can't let you proceed without *close* supervision. In fact, under normal circumstances I'd be duty-bound to report you. Take it as a token of good faith between our precincts that I haven't done so."

links.title: Volition: "The lieutenant thinks you're some u..."
links.text: The lieutenant thinks you're some unaccountable wreck who needs constant supervision, but you don't *have* to listen to him. You're free to disobey.

links.title: You: ""I know what the RCM is.""
links.text: "I know what the RCM is."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's good.""
links.text: "That's good."

links.title: You: ""What's the RCM?""
links.text: "What's the RCM?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That would be us. The Revachol Cit..."
links.text: "That would be us. The Revachol Citizens Militia."

links.title: You: ""You don't need to *supervise* me,..."
links.text: "You don't need to *supervise* me, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Except that I *do*, detective.""
links.text: "Except that I *do*, detective."

links.title: You: ""But what if I need some *me* time?""
links.text: "But what if I need some *me* time?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some *you* time?" The lieutenant c..."
links.text: "Some *you* time?" The lieutenant considers this a moment. "This is a police investigation, not a journey of self-discovery. You'll still have your evenings to yourself."

links.title: You: ""On second thought, maybe I *need*..."
links.text: "On second thought, maybe I *need* someone to cramp my style every now and then..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You might," he nods. "It's importa..."
links.text: "You might," he nods. "It's important not to let one's *style* interfere with their work."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant is pretty sure *styl..."
links.text: The lieutenant is pretty sure *style* is just a euphemism for *nihilistic binge-drinking*.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Is it not?"
links.text: Is it not?

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll leave the self-care for..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll leave the self-care for non-work hours."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please do," he says. "We wouldn't..."
links.text: "Please do," he says. "We wouldn't want your *regimen* to spill over into the investigation."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant is pretty sure *self..."
links.text: The lieutenant is pretty sure *self-care* is just a euphemism for *nihilistic binge-drinking*.

links.title: You: ""Sounds good.""
links.text: "Sounds good."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The RCM, or the Revachol Citizens M..."
links.text: The RCM, or the Revachol Citizens Militia, is the police force you and him are part of. A self-organized peace corps of the occupied city of Revachol, the RCM operates within a legal twilight, yet its authority is rarely questioned. Wouldn't it be embarrassing if you didn't know this?

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Just an observation.""
links.text: "Nothing. Just an observation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You have a..." He's looking for th..."
links.text: "You have a..." He's looking for the right words. "...a *distinctive* way of walking. If I were to walk *in front* of you, we would surely collide."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean *distinctive*?""
links.text: "What do you mean *distinctive*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope you don't take this the wro..."
links.text: "I hope you don't take this the wrong way, it's just a collegial observation. In the 57th we call it the 'Jamrock shuffle'. Officers from Jamrock's 41st Precinct tend to move a bit erratically."

links.title: You: ""How's that?""
links.text: "How's that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They say it's a scene-clearing tec..."
links.text: "They say it's a scene-clearing technique developed by one of your lieutenants for gathering evidence. It's erratic, yet thorough. Prioritises containers."

links.title: Interfacing: "Yes, but containers *contain*. Thin..."
links.text: Yes, but containers *contain*. Things. Shiny things. They're interesting.

links.title: You: ""You're kidding me? Why containers?""
links.text: "You're kidding me? Why containers?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. Containers... contai..."
links.text: "I don't know. Containers... contain, I guess. I'm making assumptions. We should move on."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Passing along frivolous inter-depar..."
links.text: Passing along frivolous inter-departmental stereotypes is not usually his *oeuvre*. He regrets bringing it up.

links.title: You: ""Okay then.""
links.text: "Okay then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He simply nods."
links.text: He simply nods.

links.title: You: ""That's racist. I don't prioritise..."
links.text: "That's racist. I don't prioritise containers."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure you don't. It's just a st..."
links.text: "I'm sure you don't. It's just a stupid inter-departmental thing. I'm making assumptions... we should move on."

links.title: You: "Let it go."
links.text: Let it go.

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant, I have a confession to..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, I have a confession to make. *I* am the murderer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant appears unfazed. "An..."
links.text: The lieutenant appears unfazed. "And what has led you to this conclusion?"

links.title: You: ""I just feel this sense of doom, li..."
links.text: "I just feel this sense of doom, like an awful thing has happened."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is a common side effect of ov..."
links.text: "That is a common side effect of overindulgence. It will pass."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides, I doubt you could have ta..."
links.text: "Besides, I doubt you could have taken down a hardened mercenary single-handedly..."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "*See*? You're clearly not a man in..."
links.text: *See*? You're clearly not a man in your prime anymore.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He studies your face for signs of o..."
links.text: He studies your face for signs of offence. "Don't take it personally -- it's just that security guards kept on by large corporations tend to be better trained and better armed than officers of the RCM."

links.title: You: ""So you're saying I didn't kill him..."
links.text: "So you're saying I didn't kill him? But, Kim, it turned out to be that *I* was the one racing around town in my motor carriage..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He purses his lips. "The victim was..."
links.text: He purses his lips. "The victim wasn't run over by a drunk driver, so, while I can't condone your driving habits, the cases remain unrelated..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Look, it's not unusual for detecti..."
links.text: "Look, it's not unusual for detectives to feel complicit in the crime until the perpetrator is identified and apprehended. Especially when the investigation is dragging. So let's get back to it, shall we?"

links.title: You: ""So you're saying I didn't kill him?""
links.text: "So you're saying I didn't kill him?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I find that highly unlikely. It's..."
links.text: "I find that highly unlikely. It's not unusual for detectives to feel complicit in the crime until the perpetrator is apprehended. Especially when the investigation is dragging. So let's get back to it, shall we?"

links.title: You: ""Murder in cold blood seems like a..."
links.text: "Murder in cold blood seems like a thing I'm capable of -- if I just dare. What if I *already* dared?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Teenage nonsense," he dead pans. "..."
links.text: "Teenage nonsense," he dead pans. "You would have had to be ready to use lethal force long ago, when you joined the RCM."

links.title: You: ""But it all makes so much sense! It..."
links.text: "But it all makes so much sense! It would have been *so* convenient for me to forget all about the murder, and everything else..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thus far your memory loss does not..."
links.text: "Thus far your memory loss does not seem to be *convenient* for you or anyone else. Except insofar as you've managed to avoid doing any work."

links.title: You: ""I did it for the Union. For the ri..."
links.text: "I did it for the Union. For the rights of the workers."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You wouldn't have been sent to inv..."
links.text: "You wouldn't have been sent to investigate this case if you had close connections with the Union -- at least that's the hope. Also," he looks you over, "you don't strike me as a *Union man*."

links.title: You: ""I'm a bad person. I believe I coul..."
links.text: "I'm a bad person. I believe I could have done anything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "Well, we've yet to find..."
links.text: He sighs. "Well, we've yet to find any real evidence pointing to you in this case, or even a possible motive, so let's not add you to the list of suspects just yet."

links.title: You: ""Nothing". [Leave.]"
links.text: "Nothing". [Leave.]
